_sText:
Basically the same Map as gg_thehole_final. I just added a tunnel on each side so its a bit bigger. 




***for the people who dont know what to do after downloading:
     1. unzip the downloaded file 
     2. copy the unziped file and put it into C:Programs/Valve/Steam/Steamapps/Accountname/Counter-    Strike Source/Cstrike/maps 
     3. get ingame and choose "create server" on the menu 
     4. choose the mapname and add the settings you want, create the server and enjoy the map!***
